I don't hate BCH at all. I'm fine with one or many chains existing as long as they aren't portrayed inaccurately. I don't think it's legitimate to call BCH "Bitcoin" and to use my statements out of context to imply support.

The Segwit part of SegWit2x happened, but the 2x part did not. Regardless, I supported it. Roger did not support SegWit2x, and was fully on board with BCH since its inception. And ShapeShift offers lots of coins for sale, that doesn't mean I personally endorse them (...Ripple)

Roger - please stop referencing me to back up your opinion that Bitcoin Cash is Bitcoin. It isn't. Bitcoin is the chain originating from the genesis block with the highest accumulated proof of work. The Bitcoin Cash fork failed to gain majority, thus it is not Bitcoin.
